name: Roundtable (MinghongX)
description:
Be careful behind you!
A mouse-controlled games, turn the mouse to rotate the angle of view.
Press the left button to switch the camera to the right hand, and then press the right button to activate the skill, the scroll wheel adjusts the direction of the hand, and press the left button again to switch back to the default perspective.
The control on the other side is just the opposite.
